code: import*as React from'react';import{Box}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Button as CustomButton}from'../components/Button';import startImage from'../assets/images/punx-start.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StartScreen=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{height:'100vh',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',gap:'0rem',p:2,textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:startImage,alt:"Punctuation Game",style:{maxWidth:'100%',height:'auto',marginBottom:'4rem'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomButton,{onClick:()=>navigate('/select'),children:"Start Game"})]});};export default StartScreen;
